item.author: weekendparty@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Weekend Party | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Bumblebee, Beefs and Bruce
item.itunes:title: Bumblebee, Beefs and Bruce
item.itunes:subtitle: A VW Beetle transforms Die Hard
item.description:
A SPINOFF transforms the Movie House, is DIE HARD a Christmas movie? Can you resell your DIGITAL DOWNLOADS? LED ZEPPELIN'S JIMMY PAGE 'beefs' with ROBBIE WILLIAMS and the car from BACK TO THE FUTURE hits the water!

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty
item.itunes:summary: A SPINOFF transforms the Movie House, is DIE HARD a Christmas movie? Can you resell your DIGITAL DOWNLOADS? LED ZEPPELIN'S JIMMY PAGE 'beefs' with ROBBIE WILLIAMS and the car from BACK TO THE FUTURE hits the water!
item.itunes:keywords: Bumblebee, Transformers, 1987, VW Beetle, Hailee Steinfeld, John Cena, Angela Basset, Dylan O'Brein, Die Hard, Greatest Christmas Story, 4K, digital music, Redigi inc, Robbie Williams, Jimmy Page, Led Zeppelin, William Burges, Delorean, Hovercraft

item.author: weekendparty@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Weekend Party | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: JLo teases Elvis with an Ice Cube
item.itunes:title: JLo teases Elvis with an Ice Cube
item.itunes:subtitle: The Movie and Music Biz are changing
item.description:
Jennifer Lopez is back for a SECOND ACT so is CELEBRITY DEATH MATCH thanks to ICE CUBE. Is the music industry heading for a BOOM? QUEEN song is the most streamed song of the 20th Century, ELVIS is back in Germany and Teaser Trailers are driving pop culture.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty
item.itunes:summary: Jennifer Lopez is back for a SECOND ACT so is CELEBRITY DEATH MATCH thanks to ICE CUBE. Is the music industry heading for a BOOM? QUEEN song is the most streamed song of the 20th Century, ELVIS is back in Germany and Teaser Trailers are driving pop culture.
item.itunes:keywords: Jennifer Lopez, Second Act, Ice Cube, Celebrity Death Match, MTV, Date Night, Pink Floyd, Led Zeppelin, Queen, Ed Sheeran, Elvis, Freidberg, Germany, Vanessa Hudgens, Avengers: Endgame, Lion King,Lyor Cohen, Youtube, Streaming, 1998, fly-girl

item.author: weekendparty@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Weekend Party | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Thriller, Bombs and Prince
item.itunes:title: Thriller, Bombs and Prince
item.itunes:subtitle: Foxx has a Licence to Thrill
item.description:
ROBIN HOOD at the movies again, is it any good? A movie on PRINCE'S songs is in the works, MICHAEL JACKSON'S THRILLER is how old? EDDIE MURPHY is a daddy again, DRAKE is the most streamed artist in 2018 and hit US television shows get licensed for the Far East.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty
item.itunes:summary: ROBIN HOOD at the movies again, is it any good? A movie on PRINCE'S songs is in the works, MICHAEL JACKSON'S THRILLER is how old? EDDIE MURPHY is a daddy again, DRAKE is the most streamed artist in 2018 and hit US television shows get licensed for the Far East.
item.itunes:keywords: Robin Hood,Taron Eagerton,Jamie Foxx,Bono daughter,Arrow,Prince,Purple Rain,Thriller,Michael Jackson,Drake,Eddie Murphy,Sabrina,Apple music, Spotify,1908,Jamie Doran,Bomb,Last Man Standing,How I Met Your Mother,Coming to America 2Bevery Hills Cop

item.author: weekendparty@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Weekend Party | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Fight Night on Broadway
item.itunes:title: Fight Night on Broadway
item.itunes:subtitle: The Boss and The Boxing
item.description:
Creed II punches above the belt on the big screen, the teaser trailer for the 'live action' remake of The Lion King racks up over 224 million hits in 24 hours, Bruce Springsteen on Broadway is coming to Netflix in December, Katy Perry is the highest earning female in music this year as Kenny G plays the stock market and its Wilder vs Fury for the WBC Championship Belt.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty
item.itunes:summary: Creed II punches above the belt on the big screen, the teaser trailer for the 'live action' remake of The Lion King racks up over 224 million hits in 24 hours, Bruce Springsteen on Broadway is coming to Netflix in December, Katy Perry is the highest earning female in music this year as Kenny G plays the stock market and its Wilder vs Fury for the WBC Championship Belt.
item.itunes:keywords: Creed 2,Sylvester Stallone,Michael B Jordan,Boxing,Lion King,James Earl Jones,Lebo M,Circle of Life,Bruce Springsteen,Broadway,The Boss,Netflix,Forbes,Katy Perry,Taylor Swift,Pink,Beyonce,Lady Gaga,Kenny G,Starbucks,Deontay Wilder,Tyson Fury,WBC

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Toxic Submarine in a Jam
item.itunes:subtitle: No Black Friday info here...
item.description:
The submarine movie Hunter Killer hits the movie screen, Snoop Dogg gets his Star on the Walk of Fame, Space Jam 2 is happening, A David Bowie virtual museum will be a downloadable app. Kanye West and Mark Zuckerberg do Karaoke and Toxic is Oxford's word of the year.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty
item.itunes:summary: The submarine movie Hunter Killer hits the movie screen, Snoop Dogg gets his Star on the Walk of Fame, Space Jam 2 is happening, A David Bowie virtual museum will be a downloadable app. Kanye West and Mark Zuckerberg do Karaoke and Toxic is Oxford's word of the year.
item.itunes:keywords: Hunter Killer, Gerard Butler, Common, Gary Oldman, Linda Cardellini, Space Jam 2, Le Bron James, David Bowie Is, 2651, Snoop Dogg, Walk of Fame, Toxic, Kanye, Zuckerberg, Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Amazing Grace and The Book of Face | 17 November 2018
item.itunes:subtitle: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report.
item.description:
The crime caper Widows is at the movies, Aretha Frankin's gospel concert finally gets a release some 40 years after it was filmed. Cheech and Chong are pushing hemp based grooming products, Facebook are trying to lure back the teens as Spielberg, Winfrey and Jones reunite for another shot at The Color Purple. Your favorite horror character is now ready to 'slash' your Christmas tree.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty
item.itunes:summary: The crime caper Widows is at the movies, Aretha Frankin's gospel concert finally gets a release some 40 years after it was filmed. Cheech and Chong are pushing hemp based grooming products, Facebook are trying to lure back the teens as Spielberg, Winfrey and Jones reunite for another shot at The Color Purple. Your favorite horror character is now ready to 'slash' your Christmas tree.
item.itunes:keywords: Widows,Viola Davis, Aretha Franklin, Oprah, Spielberg, Facebook,trick or treat,Leatherface,jigsaw,lasso,Sade,Cheech and Chong,The Color Purple, Weekend Party, Entertainment Report, Lance Zeeman, Hot 91.9 FM, Solid Gold Podcasts

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Spiders, Sequels, Spice Girls and Little Mix | 10 November 2018
item.itunes:subtitle: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report.
item.description:
Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. In this episode : Computer Hacker Lisbeth Salander is back as Hollywood gets an overdose of sequelitis. Next up is Austin Powers, Gladiator and Shrek. The Spice Girls are back minus Posh, but Little Mix is where Girl Power is at as Duran Duran become socially aware courtesy of David Medina.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty
item.itunes:summary: Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. item.itunes:keywords: Dragon Tattoo, Austin Powers, Gladiator, Shrek, Spice Girls, Girl Power, Little Mix, Joan of Arc, Duran Duran, David Medina, Weekend Party, Entertainment Report, Lance Zeeman, Shane The Duke Wellington, Hot 91.9 FM, Solid Gold Podcasts

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Do the Neymar as Tyson grows Weed in the Jungle with 50 and Prince! | 3 November 2018
item.itunes:subtitle: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report.
item.description:
Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. In this episode : Tyler Perry's NOBODY'S FOOL, tech magnate John McAfee's life is getting the movie treatment. Mike Tyson ROLLS WITH THE PUNCHES as he farms weed. PRINCE gets the doccie treatment and 50 Cent resumes his beef with JA RULE as STOP, DROP and ROLL becomes a thing courtesy of NEYMAR.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty

item.itunes:keywords: TIFFINAY HADDISH, WHOOPPIE GOLDBERG, SETH ROGEN, McAFEE, MIKE TYSON, WEED, MARIJUANA, PRINCE, 50, JA RULE NEYMAR, Weekend Party, Entertainment Report, Lance Zeeman, Shane The Duke Wellington, Hot 91.9 FM, another Solid Gold studios podcast

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: First Man in Black Samples a Cat on Halloween | 27 October 2018
item.itunes:subtitle: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report.
item.description:
Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. In this episode :Its a Giant Leap for biopics as Niel Armstrong's journey from a test pilot to astronaut gets the movie treatment in FIRST MAN. The filming on the MIB spin off with Chris Hemsworth has wrapped, will we get to see a Big Willie cameo? Conceptual artist Sophie Calle's cat died so she recorded a 37 track album in dedicated to her late feline friend. Nicki Minaj is being sued for sampling Tracey Chapman with out getting permission, the irony is that the song is called SORRY. It's a very Happy Halloween as Freddy Krueger, Jason Voorhees, Ghostface, Michael Myers and Leatherface spoof the Backstreet Boys with 'I'LL KILL YOU THAT WAY'

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty
item.itunes:summary: Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. In this episode :Its a Giant Leap for biopics as Niel Armstrong's journey from a test pilot to astronaut gets the movie treatment in FIRST MAN. The filming on the MIB spin off with Chris Hemsworth has wrapped, will we get to see a Big Willie cameo? Conceptual artist Sophie Calle's cat died so she recorded a 37 track album in dedicated to her late feline friend. Nicki Minaj is being sued for sampling Tracey Chapman with out getting permission, the irony is that the song is called SORRY. It's a very Happy Halloween as Freddy Krueger, Jason Voorhees, Ghostface, Michael Myers and Leatherface spoof the Backstreet Boys with 'I'LL KILL YOU THAT WAY'
item.itunes:keywords: Moonlanding, space, sample, cat, permission, copyright, spoof, halloween, sued, Weekend Party, Entertainment Report, Lance Zeeman, Shane The Duke Wellington, Hot 91.9 FM, another Solid Gold Studios podcast, Gavin Kennedy
